## About Me

Passionate mathematics student interested in:
- üß† Machine learning 
- üìä Data science
- üë®‚Äçüíª Software development

Open-minded and outgoing person with aptitudes for team working and quickly adopting new skills. Hardworking and thorough always learning and gaining more experience.

### Other facts
- üó£Ô∏è I'm the president of [Societat Joventut Musical d'Albal](https://www.sjmalbal.com), a non-profit association with a social mass of 350 members, 7 musical groups of up to 120 musicians and a music school with 17 employees and 160 students. This volunteering gives me great experience in leadership, team management and project management.
- üé∫ As you can guess, I'm very passionate about music! I play the trumpet and the drums and I'm part of several music groups in SJMA, the music association mentioned above.
